naslov: Kuća s bazenom u blizini Cavtata (prodaja)
opis: Prodaje se uređena kuća s prostranom okućnicom i bazenom na Obodu, idealna lokacija u blizini Cavtata i zračne luke. Kuća se prostire na 3 etaže i sastoji se od dvije zasebne stambene jedinice. U prizemlju se nalazi trosobni stan s tri banje, hodnikom, kuhinjom i dnevnim boravkom, kao i velikom taracom s koje skale vode na donju tarace na kojoj je otvoreni bazen (30 m2). Na prvom katu i u visokom potkrovlju je stan s 4 spavaće sobe, 3 banje, dnevnim boravkom, kuhinjom te 2 velike tarace s predivnim pogledom na Cavtat, more kao i Dubrovnik u daljini. Ukupna netto kvadratura kuće je 336,60 m2 od čega je: -bazen:  30 m2 + 20 m2 strojarnica -prizemlje:  stan 70 m2 + 37m2 sprema + taraca ispred koja je skalinima odvojena od dijela na kojem je bazen -stan na katu: 135 m2 + 146 m2 tarace/ balkoni Ukupna površina zemljišta iznosi 587 m2 i parking je osiguran na zemljištu. Izgradnja kuće je završena 2006 godine te je uredno održavana. Vlasništvo i papiri uredni. Za sve dodatne informacije ili ukoliko ste zainteresirani pogledati objekt stojimo na raspolaganju. Agencijska provizija za kupca iznosi 2% +pdv. Fully furnished house with swimming pool for sale in Obod, an ideal location near Cavtat and the airport. The house is spread over 3 floors and consists of two separate residential units. On the ground floor there is a three-bedroom apartment with three bathrooms, hallway, kitchen, living room and a large terrace from which stairs lead to the lower terrace where there is an open pool (30 m2). On the first floor and in the high attic is a duplex apartment with 4 bedrooms, 3 bathrooms, living room, kitchen and 2 large terraces with wonderful views of Cavtat, the sea and Dubrovnik in the distance. The total net square footage of the house is 336.60 m2, of which: -swimming pool: 30 m2 + 20 m2 engine room - ground floor: apartment 70 m2 + 37 m2 storage + terrace in front of it, which is separated by stairs from the part where the pool is - apartment on the first floor: 135 m2 + 146 m2 terraces/balconies The total area of the plot is 587 m2 and private parking is provided on the plot. The construction of the house was completed in 2006 and it was regularly maintained. For any additional information or if you would wish to see the property please feel free to contact us. Agency commission for the buyers is 2% + vat. ID KOD AGENCIJE: 40 Espresso nekretnine Mob: 098 1869 246, 091 504 2020 E-mail: info@espressonekretnine.hr www.espressonekretnine.hr
Grijanje: Sustav grijanja: Sustav grijanja, klimatizacije i ventilacije
